RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Preference by condition eligibility). In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track. (Rail at 10 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICE SHARD stalked the pace, challenged along the inside on the second turn, drew away for a clear lead entering the stretch and held under steady encouragement. REGIMENTAL set the pace to the second turn, swung out entering the stretch, fell back, came again and was gaining late. BORDER PATROL was away alertly, raced mid pack, saved ground, lacked room on the turn, fell back, got through entering the stretch, angled out, bid willingly and didn't have enough late. EVEN THE WIND raced mid pack, challenged three across on the turn, was carried out, fell back and continued willingly to the wire. MONEY AGENT was a bit washy in the post parade, broke in the air to be the last away, was rated early, rallied on the turn to get within range and lacked the needed late response.

ENTRY.NAME: Border Patrol
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly,saved ground,awaited room turn, got thru, angled out

ENTRY.NAME: Money Agent
ENTRY.COMMENT: washy post parade, broke in air, rated early, bid, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Regimental
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, swung out into stretch, fell back, came again, gaining,

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Shard
ENTRY.COMMENT: challenged inside turn, drew clear into stretch, steady urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Even the Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, challenged 3across turn, carried out into stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 18000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS OR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming races for $10,000 or less not considered in e ligibility and allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PINBALLER raced close to the pace, challenged for the lead on the turn, dueled through the stretch and prevailed in a long drive. TIMEHASCOME broke out, raced in close, rallied five wide leaving the turn, dueled late and was outnodded to just miss. SWISS GUARD veered out at the start, set the pace while racing in hand, responded when challenged to duel, faltered late and settled for show. SANTINO'S FANTASY was pushed out at the start to be off slowly, dropped inside to save ground and closed along the rail. LONESTAR CHROME veered out at the start, raced outside in the back, bore out on the turn and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Swiss Guard
ENTRY.OWNER: Vanden Berg Brittany A and Taylor Everett
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, led in hand, responded to duel, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Timehascome
ENTRY.OWNER: Martin Christopher and Hernandez Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, 5w into stretch, dueled late, outnodded, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Pinballer
ENTRY.OWNER: Dundalk 5 LLC Wesley F Herek Racing Stable LLC and Ernie T Poulos Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close, challenged turn, dueled stretch, long drive, prevailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Lonestar Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered out start, bore out turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Santino's Fantasy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed out start, off slowly, saved ground, closed rail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 93. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 22000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $6,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $13,500. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Pri ce $13,500 (Claiming races for $10,000 or less not considered in allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOMENT vied around the first turn, drew clear entering the backstretch, set the pace and drew off in the drive under mild urging. BEEALEA raced mid pack, went six wide entering the stretch, closed steadily and got up for place while no match for the winner. TWO WORLDS vied around the first turn, settled off the pace, bid willingly, came up empty late and was all out for show. GLOBAL EMPIRE was unhurried early and trailed the field, saved ground to the second turn, angled out to be widest in the drive and finished well. DANVILLE raced in the back in an even effort and failed to threaten. BLOOD MOON saved ground, advanced to the second turn and flattened out. BOURBON DELIGHT was hustled early, raced outside, tired on the turn and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Two Worlds
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied around 1st turn,settled off pace, bid, empty late, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: drew clear into backstretch, set pace, widened drive, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Global Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, saved ground to 2nd turn, finished well,

ENTRY.NAME: Beealea
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 6wide leaving turn, steady close, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Blood Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, advanced to turn, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Danville
ENTRY.COMMENT: in the back, even effort, failed to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Delight
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, raced outside, tired turn, stopped,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Claiming races for $3,200 or less not considered in eligibility and a llowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IDEA MAN raced mid pack towards the inside, bid off the rail leaving the turn, shifted out, bid between horses, assumed command and drew off under urging. PERFECT WAGER was unhurried early, saved ground, angled out for the drive and finished well to earn place while no threat to the winner. PUBLIC SAFETY came out at the start, raced mid pack, bid willingly to contend, hunmg late and settled for show. CHICKS FOR FREE trailed the field, bid inside entering the stretch, shifted out and closed well late. HATCHET CREEK was never far off the pace, rallied into the stretch to vie for the lead, came up empty late and dropped back. TEA AFTER BALLET came out at the start, lagged early, was crowded mid stretch and failed to threaten. SOUPER FORTUNE was never far back, raced inside, rallied leavving the turn to vie, altered course late and leveled off. CHOPPER was sent to the front to set the pace with a clear lead, bore out on the turn, fell back, bore out in the stretch and fell further back.

ENTRY.NAME: Souper Fortune
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, rallied into stretch, vied, altered course, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Hatchet Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied into stretch, vied, empty late, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Wager
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, saved ground, angled out for drive, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Chicks for Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, bid inside into stretch, shifted out, closed well late

ENTRY.NAME: Idea Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: bid off rail, shifted out, closed, drew off, under urging

ENTRY.NAME: Chopper
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent to front, set pace, clear lead, bore out turn, stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Public Safety
ENTRY.OWNER: Bluebreeze Racing LLC and Rosin Tim W
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out start, mid pack, bid willingly to contend, hun g late

ENTRY.NAME: Tea After Ballet
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out start, lagged early, crowded mid stretch, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 5 1/2F Turf CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Rail at 10 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIETTA vied two across, drew off in the drive for a clear lead and held safely under mild urging. MODERN SOUND was slow early, dropped inside, rallied on the turn and finished well inside to finish second best. KENWICK broke awkwardly and was in tight at the start, raced close to the pace along the inside, angled out at the top of the stretch, was carried out soon thereafter, lacked a late rally and was safe for show. BLAMELESS GHOST was slow early, bid along the rail on the turn and failed to menace in a steady effort. MOMS CHANNEL vied along the rail, altered course mid stretch and stopped. RUMBRANDT hopped and was checked at the start, raced in the back, went widest in the drive and improved position. YODA GLITZ went five wide leaving the turn, lacked a stretch response and was not a threat. MISS SAINT showed speed to the turn, fell back and steadily faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Rumbrandt
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped, checked start, widest in drive, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Kenwick
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, in tight, close inside, carried out mid stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Yoda Glitz
ENTRY.OWNER: Robertson Hugh H and Zamzow Joel
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5wide leaving turn, lacked a stretch response, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Saint
ENTRY.OWNER: Spraggins Kenneth R Palazzo Marilyn Hibionada Mary Grace Hibionada Marie Abegail
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to turn, fell back, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Moms Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied rail, altered course mid stretch, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Blameless Ghost
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, bid rail turn, steady effort, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Rietta
ENTRY.OWNER: Cherrywood Racing Stables II and Oak Rock Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2across, drew off in drive, mild urging, held safe

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Cherrywood Racing II & Oak RockRacing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Modern Sound
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, dropped inside, rallied turn, finished well inside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (Claiming races for $3,200 or less not considered i n eligibility and allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APOLLO U ANYWHERE set the pace and drew off in the drive while kept to task. AUNT STELLA came in at the start, was crowded and steadied on the backstretch, went seven wide at the top of the stretch and closed to earn place while no threat to the winner. MY LADY SLEW raced in the second flight three across, swung six wide leaving the turn, fell back, went evenly late and held for show. LITTLE BELLA was crowded at the start, raced close to the pace between horses, fell back leaving the turn and came up empty late. RANK AND FILE was squeezed and checked after the start, trailed the field, offered a mild bid only and was crowded between horses late and checked again. TAP N TWINE raced close to the pace while racing inside and gave way on the turn. HOPPESTRY raced inside in an even effort and was outrun. The stewards' posted an inquiry concerning possible interference in the stretch. No change was made.

ENTRY.NAME: Tap N Twine
ENTRY.COMMENT: close to pace, raced inside, gave way turn

ENTRY.NAME: Hoppestry
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside, even effort, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Rank and File
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed, checked start, trailed, squeezed, checked near wire

ENTRY.NAME: Little Bella
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded start,close to pace between horses, fell back, empty late

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Stella
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in start, crowded, steadied backstretch, 7wide bid, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Apollo U Anywhere
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off in drive, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: My Lady Slew
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 3across, swung 6wide into stretch, evenly late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 41000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $40,000. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or o ver since July 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Claiming races for $25,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility). In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Milea nd Seventy Yards on the main track. (Rail at 10 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAILING SOLO set a pressured pace to the second turn and drew off under mild urging. MIDNIGHT ESCAPE was pushed in at the start, steadied between horses early, was never far off the pace, awaited room into the turn, bid five wide and closed to get up for place. PROTONIC POWER awaited room into the turn, angled out at the top of the stretch and finished well to earn show. BIZZEE CHANNEL pressed the pace to the second turn, fell back, hung late and lost position. SILVER QUARTERS lagged early, raced outside, angled in on the turn, bid inside and came up empty. CAPTIVATING MOON bumped at the start, was slow early, rallied five wide on the turn and improved position. POWER THROUGH pressed the pace along the inside to the second turn, fell back and came up empty late. FAST FALL came in at the start, went four wide on the first turn, pressed three across to the second turn, tired and stopped. COYOTE ROAD bumped at the start and trailed the field.

ENTRY.NAME: Sailing Solo
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace to 2nd turn, drew off, mild urging

ENTRY.NAME: Protonic Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: awaited room into turn, angled out top of lane, closed, up for 3d

ENTRY.NAME: Power Through
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside to 2nd turn, fell back, empty late

ENTRY.NAME: Bizzee Channel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to 2nd turn, fell back, hung late, lost position

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Quarters
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged outside, angled in turn, bid inside, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Escape
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Hooves and Saddles LLC and Silver Lining Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed in start, steadied between horses early, closed, up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Fall
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Silver Lining Racing LLC Tennant Angela Tennant Kurt and 4C Sons LL
ENTRY.COMMENT: came in start, 4wide 1st turn, pressed 3across, tired, stopped,

ENTRY.NAME: Captivating Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, slow early, rallied 5wide turn, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Coyote Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, trailed, showed little,
